title: Only Girl (In The World)
author: Rihanna
lyrics:
[00:16.55] La-la-la-la
[00:20.71] La-la-la-la
[00:24.67] La-la-la-la (uh, yeah)
[00:28.51] La-la-la-la
[00:30.86] I want you to love me
[00:34.28] Like I'm a hot ride (uh, yeah)
[00:38.79] Be thinking of me (uh)
[00:41.97] Doing what you like
[00:45.90] So, boy, forget about the world
[00:48.43] 'Cause it's gon' be me and you tonight (yeah)
[00:53.91] I wanna make you beg for it
[00:56.31] Then I'ma make you swallow your pride, oh (uh, uh)
[01:01.48] Want you to make me feel like I'm the only girl in the world
[01:07.10] Like I'm the only one that you'll ever love
[01:10.95] Like I'm the only one who knows your heart
[01:15.55] Only girl in the world
[01:18.85] Like I'm the only one that's in command
[01:22.65] 'Cause I'm the only one who understands
[01:26.38] How to make you feel like a man, yeah
[01:31.72] Want you to make me feel like I'm the only girl in the world
[01:37.62] Like I'm the only one that you'll ever love
[01:41.33] Like I'm the only one who knows your heart
[01:45.88] Only one
[01:47.23] Want you to take it (uh)
[01:50.40] Like a thief in the night (uh)
[01:54.42] Hold me like a pillow
[01:57.63] Make me feel right (uh)
[02:02.48] Baby, I'll tell you all my secrets that I'm keeping
[02:05.37] You can come inside (yeah)
[02:10.35] And when you enter, you ain't leaving
[02:11.99] Be my prisoner for the night, oh
[02:17.64] Want you to make me feel like I'm the only girl in the world
[02:23.57] Like I'm the only one that you'll ever love
[02:27.17] Like I'm the only one who knows your heart
[02:31.25] Only girl in the world
[02:34.44] Like I'm the only one that's in command
[02:38.65] 'Cause I'm the only one who understands
[02:42.14] Like I'm the only one who knows your heart
[02:46.50] Only one
[02:48.46] Take me for a ride, ride
[02:52.37] Oh, baby, take me high, high
[02:56.31] Let me make you rise, rise
[02:59.88] Oh, make it last all night, night
[03:04.05] Take me for a ride, ride
[03:07.31] Oh, baby, take me high, high
[03:11.03] Let me make you rise, rise
[03:15.11] Make it last all night
[03:20.27] Want you to make me feel like I'm the only girl in the world
[03:26.39] Like I'm the only one that you'll ever love
[03:30.19] Like I'm the only one who knows your heart
[03:34.19] Only girl in the world
[03:37.82] Like I'm the only one that's in command
[03:41.63] 'Cause I'm the only one who understands
[03:45.38] How to make you feel like a man
[03:49.75] Only girl in the world
[03:54.84] Girl in the world
[03:57.40] Only girl in the world
